scripts.clean: rm -rf example/lib example/src/*.cmi example/src/*.cmj src/*.cmi src/*.cmj src/*.js
scripts.internal:bsc: mkdir -p example/lib && bsc -I src -bs-cross-module-opt -bs-package-name bucklescript-electron-example -bs-package-output example/lib -bs-files src/*.ml example/src/*.ml && cp src/electron.bs.json example/lib/
scripts.internal:build: rm -f example/index.js && npm run internal:bsc && npm run internal:pack && npm run internal:minify
scripts.internal:closure: java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar -O ADVANCED --externs closure/*.js --language_in ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --language_out ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --js_output_file example/index.js example/lib/bundle.js
scripts.internal:minify: npm run internal:babel ; [[ $NODE_ENV == 'production' ]] && (command -v java > /dev/null && npm run internal:closure || uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output example/index.js example/lib/bundle.js) || js-beautify --outfile example/index.js example/lib/bundle.js
scripts.start: ([[ ! -f example/index.js || src/electron.ml -nt example/lib/electron.js || src/electron.bs.json -nt example/lib/electron.bs.json || example/src/example.ml -nt example/lib/example.js ]] && npm run build && electron example) || ([[ -f example/index.js ]] && electron example)
